resources:
Congratulations! The Sudoku is Correct! The Sudoku is Incorrect, try again. Start Game Quick Game Mode Start Game in 9x9 Grid Start Game in 6x6 Grid Start Game in 12x12 Grid Start Game - Fill in English Start Game - Fill in Spanish How To Use This App Load New Word Pairs
Choose The Language To Fill The Sudoku In Choose The Grids Layout For The Sudoku You Cannot Start The Game Until You Have Chosen The Language to Fill The Sudoku In and The Grids Layout For The Sudoku Start My Game Now! 4 x 4 Grid 9 x 9 Grid 6 x 6 Grid 12 x 12 Grid Listen Comprehension Mode
Please check "Fill in English" or "Fill in Spanish" first
Descriptions:\n Normal Game Mode: User picks words first, and program will generate sudoku for user.\n Quick Game Mode: Generates sudoku with random words for user to play with \n Listen Comprehension Mode: Instead of words, numbers will be pre-filling the cells, and user can hear pronunciation of the word that the number corresponds to. The words that the user hears will be a different language from the language of the words on the big buttons. \n To get new words for normal game mode: Go to menu -> pick new words -> pick new English words or pick new Spanish words \n Black text in Sudoku: Pre-filled text, user may not change this text \n Green text in Sudoku: Correct text that user entered \n Red text in Sudoku: Wrong text for the cell (yes, this serves as a hint) \n
Sudoku - Delta Clear You have not initialized the game, to initialize, choose "Fill in English" or "Fill in Spanish" Finish Start UNDO
My Words Dictionary
Warning!!! If you initialized the game already, you will receive penalty if you continue to see the word translations.
Warning!!! If you initialized the game already, you will receive penalty if you continue to see the word translations. Do you want to continue?
You can save words to the dictionary by pressing the button with the word that you want to save on it first, then the "Save" button Save YES CANCEL
You have already started. You can only finish the game first, then restart another game //Two arrays of words
gato //spanish word 1. The word order is preserved.
perro
niña
niño
loro
triste
feliz
padre
madre
cat
dog
girl
boy
parrot
sad
happy
father
mother
The Words You Choose Will Appear Here! Enjoy !
The Word Pairs //Title of Word pair Display //Beginning of 9 word pairs. These two declarations are not in conflict gato //First spanish word cat //First Spanish word's corresponding English word perro dog niña girl niño boy loro parrot triste sad feliz happy padre father madre mother //End of nine word pairs
English Spanish \n cat--------gato \n dog--------perro \n girl--------niña \n boy--------niño \n parrot--------loro \n sad--------triste \n happy--------feliz \n father--------padre \n mother--------madre \n PREV NEXT Hello, please choose which word you would like to see the translation for.
